amendment.description: Amendment sought to sought to reduce the appropriation for military construction by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of June 15, to reduce the overall funding appropriated in the bill by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 258 (Roll no. 400).
